comment: Gender of the offspring can be specified by using tatua (man) or taiŋʷa (woman) as modifiers after the kinship noun
Gender of the offspring can be specified by using tatua (man) or taiŋʷa (woman) as modifiers after the kinship noun
Age/ordering of uncles/aunts can be expressed by the use of the nominal modifiers lata 'big' and ɸaβai small
